title: Their homes burned in the LA wildfires. A year later, thousands still can’t return
description: Seven in 10 residents who were forced to leave have not returned, with many living in temporary housing in other cities or even countries
content: Esmeralda Rodas sits on the ground in front of what was once the front door of her home, haunted by memories of her previous life. She remembers jumping for joy in 1989, when her husband, Hector Roda… [+8620 chars]
de: Ihre Häuser brannten bei den Waldbränden in LA. Ein Jahr später können Tausende immer noch nicht zurückkehren. Sieben von zehn Bewohnern, die das Land verlassen mussten, sind nicht zurückgekehrt, viele leben in provisorischen Unterkünften in anderen Städten oder sogar Ländern
en: Their homes burned in the LA wildfires. A year later, thousands still can’t return. Seven in 10 residents who were forced to leave have not returned, with many living in temporary housing in other cities or even countries
la: Domes eorum in LA wildfires ardebant. Post annum, milia adhuc redire non possunt. Septem in 10 habitant qui relinquere coacti non sunt reversi, cum multi in aliis civitatibus vel etiam regionibus commorationem temporalem habitantium
